definition: Great Wall Hotel (Beijing Sheraton 喜來登|喜来登)

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Chang2 cheng2 Gong1 ye4 Gong1 si1

definition: lit. until you reach the Great Wall, you're not a proper person; fig. to get over difficulties before reaching the goal
pinyin: bu4 dao4 Chang2 cheng2 fei1 hao3 han4

definition: Great Firewall of China (system for restricting access to foreign websites)

sentences.english: It was a sunny day, I went to the Great Wall.
sentences.chinese: 在一個大晴天裏，我去了長城。

sentences.english: Over the past 10-plus years, the booming tourist industry has stimulated the Great wall's renovation project.
sentences.chinese: 十幾年來，蓬勃發展的旅遊業促進了長城的修繕工程。

sentences.english: The Liberation Arm is the steel Great Wall of motherland.
sentences.chinese: 解放軍是祖國的鋼鐵長城。

sentences.english: I'll introduce China to them, such as the Great Wall, the Forbidden City and Quanzhou.
sentences.chinese: 我會向他們介紹中國，如長城，紫禁城和泉州。

sentences.english: Qin Shihuang had the Great Wall built to keep the enemy out of his empire.
sentences.chinese: 秦始皇修長城是爲了不讓敵人進入他的帝國。

sentences.english: Damaging the wall carries a penalty of up to ten years in prison, or a fine of 500, 000 yuan (Pounds44, 000).
sentences.chinese: 破壞長城最多可判十年徒刑，或者50萬元返款。

sentences.english: Within it, the Wall contains several interesting superclusters.
sentences.chinese: 在其內部，這條“長城”包含幾個有趣的超星系團。

sentences.english: They built the Great Wall to protect the country from being attacked.
sentences.chinese: 他們修建了長城，以保護國家免受攻擊。

sentences.english: It was about the Great Green Wall.
sentences.chinese: 節目的內賓是關於綠色長城的事。

sentences.english: So if the wall is 9m wide, use 18m as the width to consider resolution.
sentences.chinese: 因此如果長城寬9米，那麼就用18米作爲分辨率。

sentences.english: We'll go to the Great Wall, if you prefer.
sentences.chinese: 你如果願意的話，我們去長城。

sentences.english: The Great Wall of China is the longest man-made structure ever built.
sentences.chinese: 中國的長城是曾經建造過的最長的人工建築。

sentences.english: I took this photo browsing through an artist village near the Mutianyu section of the Great Wall of China.
sentences.chinese: 我在靠近中國長城的慕田峪段我拍攝了這張照片。

sentences.english: The Great Wall of China is one of the wonders of the world.
sentences.chinese: 中國的萬里長城是世界奇觀之一。

sentences.english: Hadrian's Wall is built across Britannia to keep out the barbarians .
sentences.chinese: 橫貫大不列顛的哈德連長城被修築用來防禦野蠻人。

sentences.english: Great Wall in Hebei Province in 1908. He described the towers as jewels.
sentences.chinese: 1908年河北省長城，他形容一串炮樓像珠寶一樣。

definition: Mt Hua 華山|华山 in Shaanxi/surname Hua
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
the Forbidden City/abbr. for 故宮博物院|故宫博物院[Gu4 gong1 Bo2 wu4 yuan4]
